text: rAjaqnyO# vajra#sya rUqpa(gm) samRu#ddhyA AqmikShAq vaiSya#sya pAkayaqj~jasya# rUqpaM puShTyaiq payO$ brAhmaqNasyaq tEjOq vai brA$hmaqNastEjaqH payaqstEja#saiqva tEjaqH paya# Aqtman dhaqttE &thOq paya#sAq vai garBA# vad^^rdhantEq garBa# ivaq Kaluq vA EqSha yad dI$kShiqtO yada#syaq payO$ vraqtaM Bava#tyAqtmAna#mEqva tad va#d^^rdhayatiq trivra#tOq vai manu#rAsIqd dvivra#tAq asu#rAq Eka#vratA- [  ] 27
